de.dfki.lt.loot.gui.nodes
Class TabularNode

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.lt.loot.gui.nodes.GraphicalNode
      de.dfki.lt.loot.gui.nodes.TabularNode

public class TabularNode
extends GraphicalNode

This is the CompositeNode class. CompositeNodes are GraphicalNodes with a number of subNodes (which are GraphicalNodes, as well).

Author:
Tassilo Barth, Pia Mennig, Antonia Scheidel

adjustSize

public void adjustSize(java.awt.Graphics g)
Description copied from class: GraphicalNode
This function computes the size of the node, and sets area such that the area rectangle is 0, 0, width, height. The computed size might be the minimal required size, which could be changed by the growTo method.

Specified by:
adjustSize in class GraphicalNode
Parameters:
g - The graphics context needed to determine the sizes of basic elements
